painPoints.title: Legacy system modernization needs
painPoints.description: Current systems lack modern capabilities and integration flexibility. Need to migrate to cloud-native architecture.

painPoints.title: Operational cost pressures
painPoints.description: Rising operational costs due to manual processes and system inefficiencies. Need automation and optimization.

opportunities.title: Cloud migration initiative
opportunities.description: Major cloud transformation program planned for 2026. Opportunity to expand platform footprint.

opportunities.title: Process automation expansion
opportunities.description: Looking to automate additional business processes. Our platform can address 3-4 new use cases.
